TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlFormatExtensionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlFormatExtensionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlFormatExtensionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定服务说明格式扩展在一个或多个扩展点运行。

span.span: Specifies that a service description format extension runs at one or more extension points.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务说明格式扩展扩展如何为使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务生成服务说明。A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET. 具体而言，服务说明格式扩展将 XML 元素添加到服务说明。Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description. SOAP 扩展生成的 XML Web 服务的客户端和服务器端运行因为有关 SOAP 扩展的信息将不会置于的服务说明时，这非常有用。This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not placed in the service description. 如果你想要添加到服务说明的 SOAP 扩展的信息，客户端可以解释为它必须运行特定的 SOAP 扩展。If you want to add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension. 必须在客户端和服务器上同时运行的 SOAP 扩展的一个示例是加密 SOAP 扩展。An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension. 如果加密 SOAP 扩展仅在服务器上运行并将返回值将其发送回客户端之前对其加密时，客户端必须运行才能解密该 SOAP 消息的 SOAP 扩展。If an encryption SOAP extension runs only on the server and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message. 否则，客户端无法处理的返回值。Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value. 使用以下步骤生成服务说明格式扩展：Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1. 生成一个类，派生自。Build a class that derives from . 2. 应用到类并指定应从该处运行的服务说明格式扩展的扩展点。Apply a to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run. 3. 根据需要应用到类并指定的类中作为新的扩展点的成员。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify a member within the class that acts as a new extension point. 4. 根据需要应用到类并指定要使用的生成的服务说明格式扩展的 XML 元素关联的 XML 命名空间前缀。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension. 5. 配置要在中运行的服务说明格式扩展`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`配置文件节。Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其服务说明格式扩展可以运行的可用类型列表中包括内置在 ASP.NET 和 Web 服务器上配置任何自定义类型。The list of available types with which a service description format extension can run include those built into ASP.NET and any custom types configured on the Web server. 以下列表中，内置于与服务说明格式扩展可以运行的 ASP.NET 的类型包括：The types built into ASP.NET that can run with a service description format extension are in the following list: - - - - - - - - - 所有这些类由 ASP.NET 生成的部分，在服务说明，请参阅。These classes all refer to sections, within a service description, that are generated by ASP.NET. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#2)]
